entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
